title: Is there a way to activate two step verification for my account?
body: Well i was just wondering if i can.

replies.body: Why isn't there though? My account has been broken into twice already, and I followed all your "Account protection guides" to the letter. They didn't even hack my account last time, or guess my password, they seemed to have gamed your system and asked for you to reset my password and that's how they got it. I doubt its hard to add 2-step verification. I don't want my account to be banned/sold because you guys didn't feel the need for 2-step verification to help us be more protected.

> [{quoted}](name=Notinghamington,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=towOk4R8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-20T17:15:46.585+0000)
>
> Why isn't there though? My account has been broken into twice already, and I followed all your "Account protection guides" to the letter. They didn't even hack my account last time, or guess my password, they seemed to have gamed your system and asked for you to reset my password and that's how they got it. I doubt its hard to add 2-step verification. I don't want my account to be banned/sold because you guys didn't feel the need for 2-step verification to help us be more protected.

i had this exact same issue, i found a password reset thing in my email but it was unused (email not opened), my email has not been breached according to live mail yet somehow they changed my password so idk wtf happened.

The "extra security" they speak of, is non existant.  I just got access to my, nearly 5 year old, account. Someone had been playing on my account, spending money and adding people; while playing ranked as if they had not a care in the world. Still no authentication options, just means Riots new owner doesn't care about players at all. If we have to constantly request tickets for account access. It would be all solved with a link to Google Mobile Authenticator. This is a joke.

So currently riot is not dedicating resources into developing a two step security procedure? i didn't hear any news recently about this. I think improving account security should be a priority, over the useless stuff  like the april fools jokes and taking away graves' cigar. It's 2017, integrating a two step verification should not be a very complicated thing.

There currently isn't a two-step verification for League, but we do have an [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide that offers some steps for extra safety practices in and outside of league.  Also check and see if your email provider also provides extra security steps.  I hope that helps!
